patterns: what is the full form of IPB
responses: It simply stands for IIT Palakkad Bot

patterns: what is for breakfast on monday
responses: Aloo paratha, Ketchup, Curd, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg, Veg: Pineapple, Mint & Coriander Chutney

patterns: what is for breakfast on tuesday
responses: Upma, Coconut chutney, Non-Veg: Boiled egg, Veg: Orange

patterns: what is for breakfast on wednesday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Vegetable Uttapam, Coconut Chutney, Sambar, Non-Veg: Boiled egg; Veg: Guava, peanut butter and For week 1 & 3: Masala Dosa, Tomato Chutney, Sambar, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Banana, peanut butter

patterns: what is for breakfast on thursday
responses: Puri, Semi-dry black Chana masala, Non-Veg: Omelette; Veg: Pineapple

patterns: what is for breakfast on friday
responses: Idly, Vada, sambar, coconut chutney, Non-veg: Boiled Egg, Veg: Banana

patterns: what is for breakfast on saturday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Semiya kichadi, Groundnut-Chutney, Peanut Butter, Non-veg: Omelette, Veg: Musk Melon and For week 1 & 3: Gobi Mix Veg Paratha, Green Coriander chutney, Peanut Butter, Non Veg: Boiled Egg, Veg: Musk Melon

patterns: what is for breakfast on sunday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Podi Dosa, Coconut Chutney, Sambar, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Banana and For week 1 & 3: Podi Dosa, Coconut Chutney, Sambar, Non-Veg: Boiled Egg; Veg: Banana

patterns: what is for lunch on sunday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Non-Veg: Chicken Biryani, Veg: Mushroom Biryani, Chana dal tadka, Raita, Fresh Fruit Juice and For week 1 & 3: Non-Veg: Chicken Butter Masala; Veg: Paneer - Semi Dry- Masala, Chapati, Veg Briyani, Raita, Fresh Fruit Juice

patterns: what is for lunch on monday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Kadhi pakoda, Aloo Gobi, Arhar Daltadka, Kerala rice, Phulka, Fresh Fruit Juice and For week 1 & 3: Payar dry, Kadhi pakoda, Tamilnadu sambar, Fresh Fruit Juice, Kerala rice, Phulka

patterns: what is for lunch on tuesday
responses: Chola Bhatura, Toor dal fry, Seasonal fruit(watermelon), Veg Jalferzi, Lemon rice, curd & sugar

patterns: what is for lunch on wednesday
responses: For week 2 & 4:  Bhindi masala, Dondakaya fry with peanuts, Chana Dal Tadta, veg Pulao, phulka, spiced buttermilk and For week 1 & 3: Bhindi masala, Baigan Bharta, Chana Dal Tadka, chapati, veg Pulao, phulka, spiced buttermilk

patterns: what is for lunch on thursday
responses: Musturd raw banana gravy, Rajma masala , Bottle Guard Sambar, Kerala rice, Phulka, Curd & Sugar

patterns: what is for lunch on friday
responses: For week 2 & 4: Musturd raw banana gravy, Rajma masala , Bottle Guard Sambar, Kerala rice, Phulka, Curd & Sugar and For week 1 & 3: Rajma masala, Bottle Guard Sambar, Kerala rice, Phulka, Minty Buttermilk

patterns: what is for lunch on saturday
responses: Drum Stick-Tomato gravy, Dal Makhni, Fried aloo, Phulka, Rasam, curd & sugar
Please specify day

patterns: give me pdf for mess menu
responses: Mess Menu and Timings IIT Palakkad.pdf
